column1: The CIRC has opened 2 security incidents recently for bad actors abusing Novant health distribution lists that allow external users to email into the organization.

We would like for IAM to review existing distribution lists for these settings and determine the business need and disable these settings as able to across the organization to prevent bad actors from using these distribution lists as way into the environment.
Distribution lists should default to "only senders inside my organization"

column1: Please follow these steps to complete verification and registration in Password Manager:
Follow the steps to complete registration and set up your password which will be valid for the next 365 days and used to authenticate to the Novant Health network
NH Link users only follow these steps:
Make note of your Corp ID (User ID) in this email.
- Hold on to this email for future use.
Wait for your Welcome Letter from the NH Link team.
- This will contain all instructions you need to set up your account and log in.
- You will not be able to log into NH Link until you have received your NH Link Welcome Letter.
Should you encounter any issues contact the Novant Health service desk at 1-866-966-8268.
Novant Health Identity and Access Management (IAM)
